name: Flip Knife Hit Dash
description:
Have you played that game, where you had to hit dash logs with knives? If not, now you have a chance to change it.
Flip knife Hit Dash is a simulator, where you have to hit dash logs with knives, flip a knife into a tree stump to break it.

In this simulator, you can open skins for knife you are going to flip. Throw your knives into a log to hit it.
After breaking each log, you are going to flip your knife on following level. Also, do not forget, that every fifth log is defended by a boss, for breaking which, you will open special knife skin.
For each hit or flip, you earn points, which you can spend unlock new skins for your knives.
Share your scores and achievements with your friends. This game would bring you much fun wherever you are.

Flip knife Hit Dash is a free to play simulator, which you would definitely like. Flip the knife, throw it into target, hit a dash log and complete every boss level.
Check your accuracy and try hit every log, in our new dash simulator.
